title: Bob Morin's Early Steps
background:
Bob Morin opened a medical practice specializing in surgery.

There was a lot to do to begin his business, and he took to the task with determination. He had to lease a building to work in, and buy various supplies before he could even begin to see patients.

During the first month of operation (August 2012), the business, titled Bob Morin, Professional Corporation (P. C.), experienced the events shown below.
instructions: Record the transactions in the journal of Bob Morin, P. C. List the transactions by date. Select transaction in list, then enter values in General Journal below.

events.item: Morin invested $39,000 in the business, which in turn issued its common stock to him.
The business paid cash for land costing $29,000. Morin plans to build an office building on the land.
The business purchased medical supplies for $1,700 on account.
Bob Morin, P. C., officially opened for business.
During the rest of the month, Morin treated patients and earned service revenue of $7,600, receiving cash for half the revenue earned.
